name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six - Rogue Spear + Mission Pack - Urban Operations [SDC]
description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear - Urban Operations is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Red Storm. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Red Storm Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear - Urban Operations is available on PC.
